verses.verse: This is the blessing, <S%H1293><s%> with which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his death. <S%H4194><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> And rose <S%H2224><s%> from Seir <S%H8165><s%> to them. <S%H3313><s%> He shone forth from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Paran. <S%H6290><s%> He came <S%H857><s%> from the ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of holy ones. <S%H6944><s%> At his right hand <S%H3225><s%> was a fiery <S%H799><s%> law for them. <S%H1881><s%>

Yes, <S%H637><s%> he loves <S%H2245><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%> All his saints <S%H6918><s%> are in your hand. <S%H3027><s%> They sat down <S%H8497><s%> at your feet; <S%H7272><s%> each receives <S%H5375><s%> your words. <S%H1703><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us a law, <S%H8451><s%> An inheritance <S%H4181><s%> for the assembly <S%H6952><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

He was king <S%H4428><s%> in Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> When the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> were gathered, <S%H622><s%> All the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
"Let Reuben <S%H7205><s%> live, <S%H2421><s%> and not die; <S%H4191><s%> Nor let his men <S%H4962><s%> be few. <S%H4557><s%>"

This is for Judah. <S%H3063><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%> "Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> Bring <S%H935><s%> him in to his people. <S%H5971><s%> With his hands <S%H3027><s%> he contended <S%H7227><s%> for himself. <S%H5828><s%> You shall be a help against his adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>"

Of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Your Thummim <S%H8550><s%> and your Urim <S%H224><s%> are with your godly <S%H2623><s%> one, <S%H376><s%> whom you proved <S%H5254><s%> at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> with whom you strove <S%H7378><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah; <S%H4809><s%>

who said <S%H559><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> and of his mother, <S%H517><s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'I have not seen him; <S%H5234><s%>' Neither did he acknowledge his brothers, <S%H251><s%> Nor did he know <S%H3045><s%> his own children: <S%H1121><s%> For they have observed <S%H8104><s%> your word, <S%H565><s%> and keep <S%H5341><s%> your covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

They shall teach <S%H3384><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> your ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> your law. <S%H8451><s%> They shall put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H6988><s%> before <S%H639><s%> you, <S%H3632><s%> and whole burnt offering on your altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his substance. <S%H2428><s%> Accept <S%H7521><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of his hands. <S%H3027><s%> Strike <S%H4272><s%> through the hips <S%H4975><s%> of those who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against him, <S%H8130><s%> of those who hate him, <S%H4480><s%> that they not rise <S%H6965><s%> again. <S%H6965><s%>"

Of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "The beloved <S%H3039><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%> by him. <S%H2653><s%> He covers him all the day <S%H3117><s%> long. <S%H7931><s%> He dwells between his shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>"

Of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "His land <S%H776><s%> is blessed <S%H1288><s%> by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> for the dew, <S%H2919><s%> for the deep <S%H8415><s%> that couches beneath, <S%H7257><s%>
for the precious <S%H4022><s%> things of the fruits <S%H8393><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the growth <S%H1645><s%> of the moons, <S%H3391><s%>
for the chief things <S%H7218><s%> of the ancient <S%H6924><s%> mountains, <S%H2042><s%> for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> hills, <S%H1389><s%>

for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and its fullness, <S%H4393><s%> the good will <S%H7522><s%> of him who lived <S%H7931><s%> in the bush. <S%H5572><s%> Let this come <S%H935><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> on the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him who was separate <S%H5139><s%> from his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

The firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of his herd, <S%H7794><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> is his. <S%H7161><s%> His horns are the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wild ox. <S%H7214><s%> With them he shall push <S%H5055><s%> all <S%H3162><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> They are the ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%> They are the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"
Of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> in your going out; <S%H3318><s%> and Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> in your tents. <S%H168><s%>

They shall call <S%H7121><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> to the mountain. <S%H2022><s%> There they will offer <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> for they shall draw <S%H3243><s%> out the abundance <S%H8228><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%> the hidden <S%H2934><s%> treasures <S%H8226><s%> of the sand. <S%H2344><s%>"

Of Gad <S%H1410><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "He who enlarges <S%H7337><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> is blessed. <S%H1288><s%> He dwells <S%H7931><s%> as a lioness, <S%H3833><s%> and tears <S%H2963><s%> the arm, <S%H2220><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> the crown of the head. <S%H6936><s%>

He provided <S%H7200><s%> the first part <S%H7225><s%> for himself, <S%H2710><s%> for there was the lawgiver's portion <S%H2513><s%> reserved. <S%H5603><s%> He came <S%H857><s%> with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%> He executed <S%H6213><s%> the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> His ordinances <S%H4941><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
Of Dan <S%H1835><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Dan <S%H1835><s%> is a lion <S%H738><s%>'s cub <S%H1482><s%> that leaps <S%H2187><s%> out of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>"

Of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> satisfied <S%H7649><s%> with favor, <S%H7522><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Possess <S%H3423><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> and the south. <S%H1864><s%>"

Of Asher <S%H836><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Asher <S%H836><s%> is blessed <S%H1288><s%> with children. <S%H1121><s%> Let him be acceptable <S%H7521><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%> Let him dip <S%H2881><s%> his foot <S%H7272><s%> in oil. <S%H8081><s%>
Your bars <S%H4515><s%> shall be iron <S%H1270><s%> and brass. <S%H5178><s%> As your days, <S%H3117><s%> so your strength will be. <S%H1679><s%>

"There is none like God, <S%H410><s%> Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> who rides <S%H7392><s%> on the heavens <S%H8064><s%> for your help, <S%H5828><s%> In his excellency <S%H1346><s%> on the skies. <S%H7834><s%>

The eternal <S%H6924><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is your dwelling <S%H4585><s%> place. <S%H5769><s%> Underneath are the everlasting arms. <S%H2220><s%> He thrust out <S%H1644><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> and said, <S%H8045><s%> 'Destroy!'

Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwells <S%H7931><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%> the fountain <S%H5869><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> alone, <S%H910><s%> In a land <S%H776><s%> of grain <S%H1715><s%> and new wine. <S%H8492><s%> Yes, <S%H8064><s%> his heavens drop down <S%H6201><s%> dew. <S%H2919><s%>

You are happy, <S%H835><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Who is like you, <S%H5971><s%> a people saved <S%H3467><s%> by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your help, <S%H5828><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of your excellency! <S%H1346><s%> Your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall submit <S%H3584><s%> themselves to you. <S%H1869><s%> You shall tread on their high places. <S%H1116><s%>"
